block.p: Sandra Taubyl Finkelstein and Kenneth Alan Abel are to be married today by Rabbi Shammai Engelmayer at the Lighthouse at Chelsea Piers in New York.

The bride, 38, is an executive vice president for product development and merchandising in New York for the Calvin Klein Jeans division of the Warnaco Group. She graduated from Boston University and is a daughter of Ana Brottman of Lakewood, N.J., and the late Murray Finkelstein.
Sandra Taubyl Finkelstein and Kenneth Alan Abel are to be married today by Rabbi Shammai Engelmayer at the Lighthouse at Chelsea Piers in New York.

The bride, 38, is an executive vice president for product development and merchandising in New York for the Calvin Klein Jeans division of the Warnaco Group. She graduated from Boston University and is a daughter of Ana Brottman of Lakewood, N.J., and the late Murray Finkelstein.

The bridegroom, 46, is a technical support manager in New York at American Field Service Intercultural Programs, the international student exchange organization. He graduated from Connecticut College and received an M.B.A. from the University of Connecticut at Storrs. He is a son of Harriet and Edmond Abel of Norwalk, Conn. His first marriage ended in divorce.
